name: Basic Plan
description: Perfect for beginners who want to start their fitness journey at an affordable rate.
features: Access to all gym equipment during staffed hours
Basic progress tracking via mobile app

name: Standard Plan
description: Ideal for regular gym-goers who want more flexibility, group sessions, and personal guidance.
features: Access to sauna and steam room

name: Premium Plan
description: For fitness enthusiasts seeking top-tier service, personal care, and 24/7 access.
features: Monthly health checkup and progress report
Priority support and early event access
